code: import axios from'axios';import jwtDecode from'jwt-decode';const API_URL=process.env.REACT_APP_API_URL||'http://localhost:5000/api';export const register=async userData=>{const res=await axios.post("".concat(API_URL,"/auth/register"),userData);return res.data.token;};export const login=async userData=>{const res=await axios.post("".concat(API_URL,"/auth/login"),userData);return res.data.token;};export const getCurrentUser=()=>{const token=localStorage.getItem('token');if(!token)return null;try{return jwtDecode(token);}catch(_unused){return null;}};export const logout=()=>{localStorage.removeItem('token');};
